trans-unit.source: Specifies options for getting a management object.
trans-unit.target: 指定選項可以讓管理物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.ObjectGetOptions"></xref> class for getting a WMI object, using default values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Management.ObjectGetOptions"></xref>類別取得 WMI 物件，使用預設值。

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設建構函式。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.ObjectGetOptions"></xref> class for getting a WMI object, using the specified provider-specific context.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Management.ObjectGetOptions"></xref>取得 WMI 物件，使用指定的提供者特定內容的類別。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A provider-specific, named-value pairs context object to be passed through to the provider.
trans-unit.target: 提供者特定名稱值配對的內容物件可以傳遞到提供者。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.ObjectGetOptions"></xref> class for getting a WMI object, using the given options values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Management.ObjectGetOptions"></xref>取得 WMI 物件，使用指定的選項值的類別。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A provider-specific, named-value pairs context object to be passed through to the provider.
trans-unit.target: 提供者特定名稱值配對的內容物件可以傳遞到提供者。

trans-unit.source: The length of time to let the operation perform before it times out.
trans-unit.target: 若要在逾時之前執行作業的時間長度。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為<xref:System.TimeSpan>.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the returned objects should contain amended (locale-aware) qualifiers; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果傳回的物件應該包含已修改 （感知地區設定） 的限定詞。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件的複本。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the objects returned from WMI should contain amended information.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出從 WMI 傳回的物件是否應該包含修改過的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Typically, amended information is localizable information attached to the WMI object, such as object and property descriptions.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，修改過的資訊是附加至 WMI 物件，例如物件和屬性描述，可當地語系化的資訊。

trans-unit.source: ## Property Value `true` if the objects returned from WMI should contain amended information; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: ##屬性值`true`如果從 WMI 傳回的物件應該包含修改過的資訊; 否則`false`。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value indicating whether the objects returned from WMI should contain amended information.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出是否從 WMI 傳回的物件應該包含修改過的資訊。</xref:System.Boolean>
